extendedInfo.description: Competitive Mantra is an android application developed to improve your competitive examination skills in various sections like Current Affairs, History, General Science, Geography, Agriculture, Aptitude, GK and political science. Our team ensures you get the best possible content about competitive examination skills.This application is developed for youths who are preparing for competitive examination like LIC AAO, Bank PO/CLERK, SBI PO/CLERK and IBPS PO,AO. This application allows you to practice for competitive exams in two modes.1. Practice Test 2. Time Trial TestInPractice Test mode, you can answer the question by pressing any of the four option buttons. If your answer is correct it is highlighted with green color. If your answer is wrong itâs highlighted with red color and correct answer highlighted with green color.In  Time Trial Test  mode, you get the feel of real online examination with approximately all the features.  In this you can mark status of each of the questions numbered like  1. You have not answered the question (NA).2. You have answered the question (A).3. You have answered the question but marked it for review (R).You can use question status panel to go to that numbered question directly.Offline Mode:You can use this application in offline mode also. The test sets your practiced previously are available in offline mode.Contact Us: We need your advice as we want to serve you better. For any suggestions or advice contact us at: spardhalive2013@gmail.com. We are very thankful to you for choosing our application and your support.Keywords: GK MCQ, General Knowledge, Current GK, Current Affairs MCQ, History MCQ, General Science MCQ, Geography mcq, Agriculture MCQ, Aptitude MCQ, and political science MCQ,Competitive Exams MCQ, GK Questions, Answers India, and Competitive quiz,Online Test, LIC AAO, Bank PO/CLERK, SBI PO/CLERK and IBPS PO, Agriculture officer, Agriculture MPSC, UPSC, Civil Services, PSI, STI ,sales tax officer, Police Examination, Railway Exam.
